item.title: A Trip to Spain That Ended up in Senegal
item.description: Most reckless deeds start with a deceptively innocent plan. Evan McGregor thought of going for a motorcycle ride in Spain, and ended up in Eastern Siberia and then North America, the long way round. I thought of going for a motorcycle ride in Spain, and ended up in Dakar, and then Mbur in Senegal. I moved to Karlsruhe in 2012 by invitation to work for 1&1 Internet AG. Once I’ve adopted to the new center of my personal universe, I’ve started to look at my new travel options.
